verses.verse: Yahweh, <WH3068> our Lord, <WH3068> how majestic <WH117> is your name <WH8034> in all the earth, <WH776> who has set <WH5414> your glory <WH1935> above the heavens! <WH8064>

From the lips <WH6310> of babes <WH5768> and infants <WH3243> you have established <WH3245> strength, <WH5797> because of your adversaries, <WH6887> that you might silence <WH7673> the enemy <WH341> and the avenger. <WH5358>
When I consider <WH7200> your heavens, <WH8064> the work <WH4639> of your fingers, <WH676> the moon <WH3394> and the stars, <WH3556> which you have ordained; <WH3559>
what is man, <WH582> that you think <WH2142> of him? <WH1121> What is the son of man, <WH120> that you care for him? <WH6485>
For you have made him a little <WH4592> lower <WH2637> than God, <WH430> and crowned <WH5849> him with glory <WH3519> and honor. <WH3519>
You make him ruler <WH4910> over the works <WH4639> of your hands. <WH3027> You have put <WH7896> all things under his feet: <WH7272>
All sheep <WH6792> and cattle, <WH504> yes, <WH929> and the animals of the field, <WH7704>
The birds <WH6833> of the sky, <WH8064> the fish <WH1709> of the sea, <WH3220> and whatever passes through <WH5674> the paths <WH734> of the seas. <WH3220>
Yahweh, <WH3068> our Lord, <WH3068> how majestic <WH117> is your name <WH8034> in all the earth! <WH776>
